column5: Well maintained room and bathroom. House is situated on corner lot. Extended covered patio with fenced backyard. Kitchen has plenty of counter top space. Neighborhood features includes park area.   You will love staying in my home, it's a 10 minute drive from the DFW airport. Irving is right in the center of Dallas so drive to Downtown or anywhere is a breeze. Neighborhood is safe and quiet.  My place is great for Business Travelers, solo adventures and for couples.
column8: Premium Room at Home near DFW & LoveField Airport
